text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subtitle, the University System of Maryland may satisfy any reporting requirement required by this subtitle or by regulations adopted under this subtitle by submitting to the Secretary an annual report on the System's equal employment opportunity policies and programs in such format as is determined by the System's Board of Regents.

An appointing authority shall provide each employee subject to this subtitle with a notice of:
the protections and remedies against employment discrimination available to the employee under:
this subtitle;
the laws governing the Commission on Civil Rights; and
the laws governing the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission; and
the applicable time limitations for filing complaints under those laws.
